alignments.name: Certification Exam Development Standards
alignments.description: IBM's Professional Certification exam development methodology is a detailed and rigorous process leveraging only qualified IBM subject matter experts following proven techniques including job task analysis (JTA), objective development, item development, and psychometrics to produce certification exams meeting the highest industry standards.

badge_template_activities.title: The IBM Certification Exam Developer badge is awarded to subject matter experts who actively participate in the development of a credential associated with the IBM Professional Certification Program . These individuals are recognized for their knowledge and expertise in a product or solution area.

This Badge does not support an application process.  Badges are awarded by the IBM Professional Certification Program directly to qualifying subject matter experts that participated in one commercial credential publication during calendar year 2021.

badge_template_activities.title: The badge holder must pass the annual IBM Cloud Solutions Sales Mastery exam.  Successful completion of the Sales Mastery exam maintains their PartnerWorld membership status as well as authorization to resell products through the IBM Software Value Plus program.

6064db8d-c703-4ff8-969e-cc39a30b3728.description: An IBM Cloud Associate Site Reliability Engineer (SRE) is a cloud professional who engineers scalable, secure, and highly reliable services that sustain service-level objectives, utilizing automation, DevOps principles, service observability, proactive maintenance, and rigorous troubleshooting for critical workloads on IBM Cloud.
6064db8d-c703-4ff8-969e-cc39a30b3728.name: IBM Certified Associate SRE - Cloud v1

badge_template_activities.title: Successful completion of IBM Certified Associate SRE - Cloud v1

9accff2c-1597-49eb-9e4d-f0f3c7df36ab.description: The IBM Cloud for Financial Services Specialty prepares a cloud professional to assist with the creation or migration of regulated workloads to IBM Cloud for Financial Services. This cloud professional can: identify motivations and benefits; understand environment complexity; determine appropriate technical solutions for modern, cloud-native architectures that utilize container platforms and cloud services; and implement migration strategies.
9accff2c-1597-49eb-9e4d-f0f3c7df36ab.name: IBM Cloud for Financial Services v1 Specialty

badge_template_activities.title: Successful completion of IBM Cloud for Financial Services v1 Specialty

012281bc-f432-4cf3-81fa-4a290d05cbb0.description: An IBM Cloud Technical Advocate is a professional in a technical role, usually with less than one year of foundational cloud knowledge; their experience derives from information technology-related disciplines. They discern client-specified requirements and goals, then facilitate an appropriate solution with IBM Cloud, helping clients realize benefits related to leading industry and IBM Cloud offerings. Areas of focus include cloud components, architecture, and methodologies.
012281bc-f432-4cf3-81fa-4a290d05cbb0.name: IBM Certified Technical Advocate - Cloud v4

alignments.name: IBM Professional Certification Development Standards
alignments.description: IBM's certification development methodology encompasses a detailed and thoroughly proven 10-step process, which includes psychometrics, job-task analysis, item development, exam administration, and exam performance reviews as core components for ensuring each certification measures up to the highest quality and integrity standards possible.

badge_template_activities.title: Exam IBM Cloud Technical Advocate v4 : C1000-158

b7b3ee4c-1542-43b2-a620-45e7fc589556.description: This badge earner has a foundational understanding of the IBM Watson Supply Chain solutions/offerings. The individual can describe the capabilities of IBM Watson Supply Chain and how they bring value to key buyers and influencers involved in the sales process. The individual understands the competitive landscape and can identify prospects and opportunities.
b7b3ee4c-1542-43b2-a620-45e7fc589556.name: IBM Watson Supply Chain - Sales Mastery v1

badge_template_activities.title: Required: Pass the M8010-852: IBM Watson Supply Chain Sales Mastery Test v1.

be9aa236-a234-4a7e-99d7-22782add8aa2.description: This intermediate level certification is intended for solution implementers who are responsible for developing, governing, configuring, troubleshooting and deploying solutions using IBM DataPower Gateway. This includes all form factors of the offering.
be9aa236-a234-4a7e-99d7-22782add8aa2.name: IBM Certified Solution Implementer - DataPower Gateway v7.6

badge_template_activities.title: Successful completion of IBM Certified Solution Implementer - DataPower Gateway v7.6

b2227f0b-1b50-4a2e-843f-15277a3d2e74.description: The IBM Flash Technical Specialist consults with customers to gather needs, understand business requirements, participate in the design process, select storage products, and articulate the benefits of IBM Flash. This specialist has broad industry knowledge of storage features and functions, industry-wide terminology, and specific IBM storage solutions including software defined environments within the overall IBM portfolio. They also have an understanding of competitive flash offerings.
b2227f0b-1b50-4a2e-843f-15277a3d2e74.name: IBM Certified Specialist - Flash Technical Solutions V2

badge_template_activities.title: Successful completion of IBM Certified Specialist - Flash Technical Solutions V2
